sn56.18:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn56.18:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn56.18:4.7: “Yaṃ kho, bhikkhu, dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya ñāṇaṃ—
sn56.18:5.1: Tasmātiha, bhikkhu, ‘idaṃ dukkhan’ti yogo karaṇīyo … pe …
